WRITING.TEXT: I guess you got me there...^^

red sauce (on the beef) : i made caramel and deglazed it with vinegar and worcestersauce added some ketchup and let it cook briefly and season with green pepper.
the white sauce (for the salad) : just mix mayonaise, rough-textured mustard, salt, vinegar, white pepper.
yeah but hey i made the bun !
